name: election
description: - **What it is:** A Python-based political board game, now with a Flask backend and a mobile-friendly web frontend. - **Goal:** Make the game playable on iPhone (and other devices) via a web browser. - **All blue gradient bars have been removed for a cleaner, more information-dense interface.** - **The UI is now more compact, with full-width identity cards and neutral backgrounds for all status bars.**
